sentences.en: Aim To examine the quality of purified water made by reverse osmosis.
sentences.cn: 目的考察二级反渗透法制备纯化水的质量.

sentences.en: Blood can be cleaned by osmosis if the kidneys have failed.
sentences.cn: 若肾功能衰退,可通过渗透作用使血液净化.

sentences.en: Children seem to learn about computers by osmosis.
sentences.cn: 孩子们似乎不知不觉地就了解了计算机。

sentences.en: Childrenseem to learn about computers by osmosis.
sentences.cn: 儿童似乎不知不觉地就了解了计算机.

sentences.en: Developering add an anionic surfactant so that developer by osmosis.
sentences.cn: 显影液洋补充阴离子暗不天活性剂,以利于显影剂不合泌.

sentences.en: Frogs never drink. They absorb water from their surroundings through osmosis.
sentences.cn: 蛙类从不喝水, 它们通过渗透压的调节,从周围环境中吸收水分.

sentences.en: He seems to absorb information through a process of osmosis.
sentences.cn: 他似乎是通过耳濡目染来吸收信息的。

sentences.en: If we put the salt water under pressure, we achieve reverse osmosis.
sentences.cn: 如果我们给盐水加压, 就可以实现“逆向渗透”.

sentences.en: It results from the uptake of water into the cell by osmosis.
sentences.cn: 其产生是由于细胞通过渗透作用吸收大量水分引起的.

sentences.en: My mother taught me about the science of OSMOSIS.
sentences.cn: 妈妈教我渗透的科学原理.

sentences.en: Perhaps, it is the impact of osmosis, is profoundly nurtured.
sentences.cn: 或许, 这样的影响是耳濡目染的, 是深刻熏陶的吧.

sentences.en: Principal application of reverse osmosis has been in desalting brackish waters for domestic consumption.
sentences.cn: 反渗透主要应用于生活用含盐水的脱盐.

sentences.en: She allowed her life to be absorbed by his, taking on as if by osmosis his likes and dislikes.
sentences.cn: 她让自己融入他的生活，似乎是潜移默化地养成和他同样的好恶。

sentences.en: Steam osmosis is a new type of separation technology.
sentences.cn: 蒸汽渗透是一种新型膜分离技术.

sentences.en: The environmental engineer does not have much opportunity to apply the principle of osmosis.
sentences.cn: 环境工程师应用反渗透原理的机会并不多.

sentences.en: Water passes into the roots of a plant by osmosis.

phrases.tran_cn: 倒转渗透器；反渗透装置

trans.tran_cn: 渗透（作用），潜移默化，耳濡目染
trans.tran_en: the gradual process of liquid passing through a membrane
